<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/interactions/{interactionGuid}/purge"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the interaction and all associated metadata.  **This action cannot be undone.**

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
